welcomeText: <0>We are happy to invite you the 8th edition of the annual bellydance festival, which will take place on 22-25 of August in the capital city of Poland — Warsaw. Our star team of teachers and performers: <1>Aida Bogomolova, Diana Gnatchenko, Alex Delora, Levana, Mohanned Hawaz, Kate Ksenzova</1> (the winner of 2023 edition), <1>musician Khader Ahmad</1> and, of course, the organizer, the heart and the soul of the festival — <1>Aliah!</1></0><0>At this edition of the festival your amazing performances on our stage will be captured by our official photographer <1>André Elbing</1>, videographer <1>Vladimir Kluchenkov</1> and given you for <1>FREE.</1></0>
